WorkItem.Description:
1. Thx 4 rawr, love it.
2. sorry for bad english
3. Me, as a Rogue playing hc inis and raids, wants expertise to be capped,
even if it costs me some dps in the calculation.
Atm there is no possibility to lock certain stats. Only thing i can do
is to add "avoided white attacks <= 0" or sth close to 0.
This results in millions  of dps and is already reportet.
on the other hand i dont know if "avoided white attacks <= X" would grant me 
26 expertise /132 expertise rating.
I hope it is possible 4 you to implement such a feature
"gem for dps, but stat x and y must be minimum z"
Thx 4 your good work, keep up :)
 
ps: i know you calculate the max dps and even with expertise not capped i am able to do lots of dps,
but ... i want it to cap. had lots of rotations broken by not gaining enough energy duo a lack pf expertise.
 
Thx, 
Alex
WorkItem.Summary: [Optimizer] Add an option in the Optimizer to reach certain stats

Comments.Message: You don't really care about expertise. You care about not getting avoided on your specials. Try "Avoided Yellow Attacks". If that produces the millions of dps problem, you'll just need to wait for the fix.
as long as i do 43% of my dmg out of auto attacks i care about expertise... or am i wrong?

I think this might be a language thing.
You don't care about *expertise* itself, you care about the resulting effect of that expertise, which is lowering the chance for you to be avoided (roughly equally for white and yellow attacks). White attacks are different in that they can miss more.
arrrr okay. Thx for your help.
